name: Verifica Codici
description: MCP server for comparing codici from CSV files against extracted document metadata. Supports dynamic field mappings and multi-column code composition.
author: intelligencebox

BOX_SERVER_URL.description: URL of the box-server for metadata queries

METADATA_QUERY_ENDPOINT.description: API endpoint path for metadata SQL queries

dataai.description: Directory for accessing CSV files and documents

features: Compare CSV codici list against metadata database
Dynamic field mappings - map any columns to any fields
Multi-column code composition with custom separators
Customizable comparison settings (case sensitivity, whitespace, partial match)
Generate detailed JSON report with matched, mismatched, and missing entries
